wealth,"in the public sense , all objects , especially material objects , which have economic utility"

web,a whole piece of linen cloth as woven
weekly,"a publication issued once in seven days , or appearing once a week"
weigh,a certain quantity estimated by weight

whim,a sudden turn or start of the mind
whirlwind,a body of objects sweeping violently onward

wit,"a mental faculty , or power of the mind"

womanhood,the state of being a woman
work,anything accomplished by exertion or toil

world,"the earth and its inhabitants , with their concerns"
